### Verify Products Sorting Options
1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com.
2. Login with username standard_user and password secret_sauce.
3. Select Name (A to Z) from the sort dropdown and verify products are sorted alphabetically from A to Z.
4. Select Name (Z to A) from the sort dropdown and verify products are sorted alphabetically from Z to A.
5. Select Price (low to high) from the sort dropdown and verify products are sorted by price from lowest to highest.
6. Select Price (high to low) from the sort dropdown and verify products are sorted by price from highest to lowest.
